{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Quickball |image = [[File:Quickball.png]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Quickball''. |price = Variable |catchTime = 1s |catchRate = Variable (Decreases with more route kills) *+15% (0 route kills) *+0% (4012 route kills) |location =
*[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] }} ==Description== The '''Fastball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector. decreases the amount of time needed to catch a Pokémon after defeating it, allowing a player to catch Pokémon and obtain Dungeon Tokens at a faster rate. ==Details== A specialized Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides no increased catch chance rate and catches Pokémon in 0.5s. ==Acquisition== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Berry Master#Trades|Goldenrod City]]|20 - 40 Random [[File:Cheri.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 1 Berries|Gen 1 Berries]]
5 - 15 Random [[File:Persim.png|25px]] [[Berries#Gen 2 Berries|Gen 2 Berries]]}} |} |}
{{Pokéballs}}
